HPI 8323 2012 Nissan GT-R R35 Jet Black (LHD)

And now for a brutal dose of reality. A left-hand drive-spec R35 in Jet Black. This was a special US-only release for "SoCal Model Cars" limited to 80 pieces worldwide. Even that was too many as some wound up in hpiracing's eBay blow-out sales for less than 50% of original MSRP.
